AdvancedDoctorStation.name: Disease Clinic
AdvancedDoctorStation.desc: Disease clinics require power, but treat more serious illnesses than sick bays alone.

AdvancedResearchCenter.name: Super Computer
AdvancedResearchCenter.desc: Super computers unlock higher technology tiers than research stations alone.

AirBorneCritterCondo.name: Airborne Critter Condo
AirBorneCritterCondo.desc: Triggers natural nesting instincts and improves critters' moods.

AirConditioner.name: Thermo Regulator
AirConditioner.desc: A thermo regulator doesn't remove heat, but relocates it to a new area.

AlgaeDistillery.name: Algae Distiller
AlgaeDistillery.desc: Algae distillers convert disease-causing slime into algae for oxygen production.

AlgaeHabitat.name: Algae Terrarium
AlgaeHabitat.desc: Algae colony, Duplicant colony... we're more alike than we are different.

Apothecary.name: Apothecary
Apothecary.desc: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.

ArcadeMachine.name: Arcade Cabinet
ArcadeMachine.desc:
Komet Kablam-O!
For up to two players.

ArtifactAnalysisStation.name: Artifact Analysis Station
ArtifactAnalysisStation.desc: Discover the mysteries of the past.

AutoMiner.name: Robo-Miner
AutoMiner.desc: A robo-miner's range can be viewed at any time by selecting the building.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.desc: Batteries allow power from generators to be stored for later.

BatteryMedium.name: Jumbo Battery
BatteryMedium.desc: Larger batteries hold more power and keep systems running longer before recharging.

BatteryModule.name: Battery Module
BatteryModule.desc: Charging a battery module before takeoff makes it easier to power buildings during flight.

BatterySmart.name: Smart Battery
BatterySmart.desc: Smart batteries send a Green Signal when they require charging.

BeachChair.name: Beach Chair
BeachChair.desc: Soak up some relaxing sun rays.

Bed.name: Cot
Bed.desc: Duplicants without a bed will develop sore backs from sleeping on the floor.

BottleEmptier.name: Bottle Emptier
BottleEmptier.desc: A bottle emptier's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.

BottleEmptierGas.name: Canister Emptier
BottleEmptierGas.desc: A canister emptier's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.

BunkerDoor.name: Bunker Door
BunkerDoor.desc: A massive, slow-moving door which is nearly indestructible.

BunkerTile.name: Bunker Tile
BunkerTile.desc: Bunker tile can build strong shelters in otherwise dangerous environments.

CO2Engine.name: Carbon Dioxide Engine
CO2Engine.desc: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.

CO2Scrubber.name: Carbon Skimmer
CO2Scrubber.desc: Skimmers remove large amounts of carbon dioxide, but produce no breathable air.

Canvas.name: Blank Canvas
Canvas.desc: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.

CanvasTall.name: Portrait Canvas
CanvasTall.desc: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.

CanvasWide.name: Landscape Canvas
CanvasWide.desc: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.

CeilingLight.name: Ceiling Light
CeilingLight.desc: Light reduces Duplicant stress and is required to grow certain plants.

Checkpoint.name: Duplicant Checkpoint
Checkpoint.desc: Checkpoints can be connected to automated sensors to determine when it's safe to enter.

Chlorinator.name: Bleach Stone Hopper
Chlorinator.desc: Bleach stone is useful for sanitation and geotuning.

ClothingAlterationStation.name: Clothing Refashionator
ClothingAlterationStation.desc: Allows skilled Duplicants to add extra personal pizzazz to their wardrobe.

ClothingFabricator.name: Textile Loom
ClothingFabricator.desc: A textile loom can be used to spin Reed Fiber into wearable Duplicant clothing.

ClusterTelescope.name: Telescope
ClusterTelescope.desc: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.

ClusterTelescopeEnclosed.name: Enclosed Telescope
ClusterTelescopeEnclosed.desc: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.

CometDetector.name: Space Scanner
CometDetector.desc: Networks of many scanners will scan more efficiently than one on its own.

Compost.name: Compost
Compost.desc: Composts safely deal with biological waste, producing fresh dirt.

GasConduitDiseaseSensor.name: Gas Pipe Germ Sensor
GasConduitDiseaseSensor.desc: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.

LiquidConduitDiseaseSensor.name: Liquid Pipe Germ Sensor
LiquidConduitDiseaseSensor.desc: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.

GasConduitElementSensor.name: Gas Pipe Element Sensor
GasConduitElementSensor.desc: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific gas in a pipe.

LiquidConduitElementSensor.name: Liquid Pipe Element Sensor
LiquidConduitElementSensor.desc: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific liquid in a pipe.

GasConduitTemperatureSensor.name: Gas Pipe Thermo Sensor
GasConduitTemperatureSensor.desc: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.

LiquidConduitTemperatureSensor.name: Liquid Pipe Thermo Sensor
LiquidConduitTemperatureSensor.desc: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.

ContactConductivePipeBridge.name: Conduction Panel
ContactConductivePipeBridge.desc: It can transfer heat effectively even if no liquid is passing through.

CookingStation.name: Electric Grill
CookingStation.desc: Proper cooking eliminates foodborne disease and produces tasty, stress-relieving meals.

CornerMoulding.name: Corner Trim
CornerMoulding.desc: Corner trim is a purely decorative addition for ceiling corners.

CraftingTable.name: Crafting Station
CraftingTable.desc: Crafting stations allow Duplicants to make oxygen masks to wear in low breathability areas.

CreatureFeeder.name: Critter Feeder
CreatureFeeder.desc: Critters tend to stay close to their food source and wander less when given a feeder.

CritterCondo.name: Critter Condo
CritterCondo.desc: It's nice to have nice things.

CritterDropOff.name: Critter Drop-Off
CritterDropOff.desc: Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.

CritterPickUp.name: Critter Pick-Up
CritterPickUp.desc: Duplicants will automatically wrangle excess critters.

CrownMoulding.name: Ceiling Trim
CrownMoulding.desc: Ceiling trim is a purely decorative addition to one's overhead area.

DLC1CosmicResearchCenter.name: Virtual Planetarium
DLC1CosmicResearchCenter.desc: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations recorded in Data Banks.

DecontaminationShower.name: Decontamination Shower
DecontaminationShower.desc: Don't forget to decontaminate behind your ears.

DevHEPSpawner.name: Dev Radbolt Generator
DevHEPSpawner.desc: Radbolts are necessary for producing Materials Science research.

DevLightGenerator.name: Dev Light Source
DevLightGenerator.desc: Brightens up a dev's darkest hours.

DevPumpGas.name: Dev Pump Gas
DevPumpGas.desc: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.

DevPumpLiquid.name: Dev Pump Liquid
DevPumpLiquid.desc: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.

DevPumpSolid.name: Dev Pump Solid
DevPumpSolid.desc: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send solids to that building.

DiningTable.name: Mess Table
DiningTable.desc: Duplicants prefer to dine at a table, rather than eat off the floor.

DoctorStation.name: Sick Bay
DoctorStation.desc: Sick bays can be placed in hospital rooms to decrease the likelihood of disease spreading.

Door.name: Pneumatic Door
Door.desc: Door controls can be used to prevent Duplicants from entering restricted areas.

EggCracker.name: Egg Cracker
EggCracker.desc: Raw eggs are an ingredient in certain high quality food recipes.

EggIncubator.name: Incubator
EggIncubator.desc: Incubators can maintain the ideal internal conditions for several species of critter egg.

Electrolyzer.name: Electrolyzer
Electrolyzer.desc: Water goes in one end, life sustaining oxygen comes out the other.

EspressoMachine.name: Espresso Machine
EspressoMachine.desc: A shot of espresso helps Duplicants relax after a long day.

EthanolDistillery.name: Ethanol Distiller
EthanolDistillery.desc: Ethanol distillers convert Lumber into burnable Ethanol fuel.

ExobaseHeadquarters.name: Mini-Pod
ExobaseHeadquarters.desc: A quick and easy substitute, though it'll never live up to the original.

ExteriorWall.name: Drywall
ExteriorWall.desc: Drywall can be used in conjunction with tiles to build airtight rooms on the surface.

FarmStation.name: Farm Station
FarmStation.desc: This station only has an effect on crops grown within the same room.

FarmTile.name: Farm Tile
FarmTile.desc: Duplicants can deliver fertilizer and liquids to farm tiles, accelerating plant growth.

FertilizerMaker.name: Fertilizer Synthesizer
FertilizerMaker.desc: Fertilizer synthesizers convert polluted dirt into fertilizer for domestic plants.

FirePole.name: Fire Pole
FirePole.desc: Build these in addition to ladders for efficient upward and downward movement.

FishDeliveryPoint.name: Fish Release
FishDeliveryPoint.desc: A fish release must be built above liquid to prevent released fish from suffocating.

FishFeeder.name: Fish Feeder
FishFeeder.desc: Build this feeder above a body of water to feed the fish within.

FloorLamp.name: Lamp
FloorLamp.desc: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.

FloorSwitch.name: Weight Plate
FloorSwitch.desc: Weight plates can be used to turn on amenities only when Duplicants pass by.

FlowerVase.name: Flower Pot
FlowerVase.desc: Flower pots allow decorative plants to be moved to new locations.

FlowerVaseHanging.name: Hanging Pot
FlowerVaseHanging.desc: Hanging pots can add some Decor to a room, without blocking buildings on the floor.

FlowerVaseHangingFancy.name: Aero Pot
FlowerVaseHangingFancy.desc: Aero pots can be hung from the ceiling and have extremely high Decor.

FlowerVaseWall.name: Wall Pot
FlowerVaseWall.desc: Placing a plant in a wall pot can add a spot of Decor to otherwise bare walls.

FlushToilet.name: Lavatory
FlushToilet.desc: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.

FoodDehydrator.name: Dehydrator
FoodDehydrator.desc: Some of the eliminated liquid inevitably ends up on the floor.

FoodRehydrator.name: Rehydrator
FoodRehydrator.desc: Rehydrated food is nutritious and only slightly less delicious.

Gantry.name: Gantry
Gantry.desc: A gantry can be built over rocket pieces where ladders and tile cannot.

GasBottler.name: Canister Filler
GasBottler.desc: Canisters allow Duplicants to manually deliver gases from place to place.

GasCargoBayCluster.name: Large Gas Cargo Canister
GasCargoBayCluster.desc: Holds more than a typical gas cargo canister.

GasCargoBaySmall.name: Gas Cargo Canister
GasCargoBaySmall.desc: Duplicants fill cargo canisters with any resources they find during space missions.

GasConduitBridge.name: Gas Bridge
GasConduitBridge.desc: Separate pipe systems prevent mingled contents from causing building damage.

GasConduit.name: Gas Pipe
GasConduit.desc: Gas pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of ventilated buildings.

GasConduitRadiant.name: Radiant Gas Pipe
GasConduitRadiant.desc: Radiant pipes pumping cold gas can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.

GasFilter.name: Gas Filter
GasFilter.desc: All gases are sent into the building's output pipe, except the gas chosen for filtering.

GasLimitValve.name: Gas Meter Valve
GasLimitValve.desc: Meter Valves let an exact amount of gas pass through before shutting off.

GasLogicValve.name: Gas Shutoff
GasLogicValve.desc: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.

GasMiniPump.name: Mini Gas Pump
GasMiniPump.desc: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of gas with minimum power.

GasPermeableMembrane.name: Airflow Tile
GasPermeableMembrane.desc: Building with airflow tile promotes better gas circulation within a colony.

GasPump.name: Gas Pump
GasPump.desc: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.

GasReservoir.name: Gas Reservoir
GasReservoir.desc: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.

GasValve.name: Gas Valve
GasValve.desc: Valves control the amount of gas that moves through pipes, preventing waste.

GasVent.name: Gas Vent
GasVent.desc: Vents are an exit point for gases from ventilation systems.

GasVentHighPressure.name: High Pressure Gas Vent
GasVentHighPressure.desc: High pressure vents can expel gas into more highly pressurized environments.

Generator.name: Coal Generator
Generator.desc: Burning coal produces more energy than manual power, but emits heat and exhaust.

GeneticAnalysisStation.name: Botanical Analyzer
GeneticAnalysisStation.desc: Would a mutated rose still smell as sweet?

GeoTuner.name: Geotuner
GeoTuner.desc: The targeted geyser receives stored amplification data when it is erupting.

GlassForge.name: Glass Forge
GlassForge.desc: Glass can be used to construct window tile.

GlassTile.name: Window Tile
GlassTile.desc: Window tiles provide a barrier against liquid and gas and are completely transparent.

GourmetCookingStation.name: Gas Range
GourmetCookingStation.desc: Luxury meals increase Duplicants' morale and prevents them from becoming stressed.

Grave.name: Tasteful Memorial
Grave.desc: Burying dead Duplicants reduces health hazards and stress on the colony.

GravitasPedestal.name: Pedestal
GravitasPedestal.desc: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.

HEPBattery.name: Radbolt Chamber
HEPBattery.desc: Particles packed up and ready to go.

HEPBridgeTile.name: Radbolt Joint Plate
HEPBridgeTile.desc: Allows Radbolts to pass through walls.

HEPEngine.name: Radbolt Engine
HEPEngine.desc: Radbolt-fueled rockets support few modules, but travel exceptionally far.

HabitatModuleMedium.name: Spacefarer Module
HabitatModuleMedium.desc: Allows Duplicants to survive space travel... Hopefully.

HabitatModuleSmall.name: Solo Spacefarer Nosecone
HabitatModuleSmall.desc: One lucky Duplicant gets the best view from the whole rocket.

HandSanitizer.name: Hand Sanitizer
HandSanitizer.desc: Hand sanitizers kill germs more effectively than wash basins.

Headquarters.name: Printing Pod
Headquarters.desc: New Duplicants come out here, but thank goodness, they never go back in.

HighEnergyParticleRedirector.name: Radbolt Reflector
HighEnergyParticleRedirector.desc: We were all out of mirrors.

HighEnergyParticleSpawner.name: Radbolt Generator
HighEnergyParticleSpawner.desc: Radbolts are necessary for producing Materials Science research.

HotTub.name: Hot Tub
HotTub.desc: Relaxes Duplicants with massaging jets of heated liquid.

HydrogenEngineCluster.name: Hydrogen Engine
HydrogenEngineCluster.desc: Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.

HydrogenGenerator.name: Hydrogen Generator
HydrogenGenerator.desc: Hydrogen generators are extremely efficient, emitting next to no waste.

HydroponicFarm.name: Hydroponic Farm
HydroponicFarm.desc: Hydroponic farms reduce Duplicant traffic by automating irrigating crops.

IceCooledFan.name: Ice-E Fan
IceCooledFan.desc: A Duplicant can work an Ice-E fan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.

IceMachine.name: Ice Maker
IceMachine.desc: Ice makers can be used as a small renewable source of ice.

InsulatedGasConduit.name: Insulated Gas Pipe
InsulatedGasConduit.desc: Pipe insulation prevents gas contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.

InsulatedLiquidConduit.name: Insulated Liquid Pipe
InsulatedLiquidConduit.desc: Pipe insulation prevents liquid contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.

InsulationTile.name: Insulated Tile
InsulationTile.desc: The low thermal conductivity of insulated tiles slows any heat passing through them.

ItemPedestal.name: Pedestal
ItemPedestal.desc: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.

JetSuitLocker.name: Jet Suit Dock
JetSuitLocker.desc: Jet suit docks can refill jet suits with air and fuel, or empty them of waste.

JetSuitMarker.name: Jet Suit Checkpoint
JetSuitMarker.desc: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.

Juicer.name: Juicer
Juicer.desc: Fruity juice can really brighten a Duplicant's breaktime

KeroseneEngineCluster.name: Petroleum Engine
KeroseneEngineCluster.desc: More powerful rocket engines can propel heavier burdens.

KeroseneEngineClusterSmall.name: Small Petroleum Engine
KeroseneEngineClusterSmall.desc: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.

Kiln.name: Kiln
Kiln.desc: Kilns can also be used to refine coal into pure carbon.

LadderBed.name: Ladder Bed
LadderBed.desc: Duplicant's sleep will be interrupted if another Duplicant uses the ladder.

LadderFast.name: Plastic Ladder
LadderFast.desc: Plastic ladders are mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.

LandingBeacon.name: Targeting Beacon
LandingBeacon.desc: Microtarget where your Interplanetary Payload lands on a Planetoid surface.

LaunchPad.name: Rocket Platform
LaunchPad.desc: A platform from which rockets can be launched and on which they can land.

LeadSuitLocker.name: Lead Suit Dock
LeadSuitLocker.desc: Lead suit docks can refill lead suits with air and empty them of waste.

LeadSuitMarker.name: Lead Suit Checkpoint
LeadSuitMarker.desc: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.

LiquidCargoBayCluster.name: Large Liquid Cargo Tank
LiquidCargoBayCluster.desc: Holds more than a regular cargo tank.

LiquidCargoBaySmall.name: Liquid Cargo Tank
LiquidCargoBaySmall.desc: Duplicants will fill cargo tanks with whatever resources they find during space missions.

LiquidConditioner.name: Thermo Aquatuner
LiquidConditioner.desc: A thermo aquatuner cools liquid and outputs the heat elsewhere.

LiquidConduitBridge.name: Liquid Bridge
LiquidConduitBridge.desc: Separate pipe systems help prevent building damage caused by mingled pipe contents.

LiquidConduit.name: Liquid Pipe
LiquidConduit.desc: Liquid pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of plumbed buildings.

LiquidConduitRadiant.name: Radiant Liquid Pipe
LiquidConduitRadiant.desc: Radiant pipes pumping cold liquid can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.

LiquidFilter.name: Liquid Filter
LiquidFilter.desc: All liquids are sent into the building's output pipe, except the liquid chosen for filtering.

LiquidFuelTankCluster.name: Large Liquid Fuel Tank
LiquidFuelTankCluster.desc: Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.

LiquidHeater.name: Liquid Tepidizer
LiquidHeater.desc: Tepidizers heat liquid which can kill waterborne germs.

LiquidLimitValve.name: Liquid Meter Valve
LiquidLimitValve.desc: Meter Valves let an exact amount of liquid pass through before shutting off.

LiquidLogicValve.name: Liquid Shutoff
LiquidLogicValve.desc: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.

LiquidMiniPump.name: Mini Liquid Pump
LiquidMiniPump.desc: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of liquid with minimum power.

LiquidPump.name: Liquid Pump
LiquidPump.desc: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.

LiquidPumpingStation.name: Pitcher Pump
LiquidPumpingStation.desc: Pitcher pumps allow Duplicants to bottle and deliver liquids from place to place.

LiquidReservoir.name: Liquid Reservoir
LiquidReservoir.desc: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.

LiquidValve.name: Liquid Valve
LiquidValve.desc: Valves control the amount of liquid that moves through pipes, preventing waste.

LiquidVent.name: Liquid Vent
LiquidVent.desc: Vents are an exit point for liquids from plumbing systems.

LogicAlarm.name: Automated Notifier
LogicAlarm.desc: Sends a notification when it receives a Green Signal.

LogicClusterLocationSensor.name: Starmap Location Sensor
LogicClusterLocationSensor.desc: Starmap Location sensors can signal when a spacecraft is at a certain location

LogicCounter.name: Signal Counter
LogicCounter.desc: For numbers higher than ten connect multiple counters together.

LogicCritterCountSensor.name: Critter Sensor
LogicCritterCountSensor.desc: Detecting critter populations can help adjust their automated feeding and care regimens.

LogicDiseaseSensor.name: Germ Sensor
LogicDiseaseSensor.desc: Detecting germ populations can help block off or clean up dangerous areas.

LogicDuplicantSensor.name: Duplicant Motion Sensor
LogicDuplicantSensor.desc: Motion sensors save power by only enabling buildings when Duplicants are nearby.

LogicElementSensorGas.name: Gas Element Sensor
LogicElementSensorGas.desc: These sensors can detect the presence of a specific gas and alter systems accordingly.

LogicElementSensorLiquid.name: Liquid Element Sensor
LogicElementSensorLiquid.desc: These sensors can detect the presence of a specific liquid and alter systems accordingly.

LogicGateAND.name: AND Gate
LogicGateAND.desc: This gate outputs a Green Signal when both its inputs are receiving Green Signals at the same time.

LogicGateOR.name: OR Gate
LogicGateOR.desc: This gate outputs a Green Signal if receiving one or more Green Signals.

LogicGateXOR.name: XOR Gate
LogicGateXOR.desc: This gate outputs a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving a Green Signal.

LogicGateNOT.name: NOT Gate
LogicGateNOT.desc: This gate reverses automation signals, turning a Green Signal into a Red Signal and vice versa.

LogicGateBUFFER.name: BUFFER Gate
LogicGateBUFFER.desc: This gate continues outputting a Green Signal for a short time after the gate stops receiving a Green Signal.

LogicGateFILTER.name: FILTER Gate
LogicGateFILTER.desc: This gate only lets a Green Signal through if its Input has received a Green Signal that lasted longer than the selected filter time.

LogicGateMultiplexer.name: Signal Selector
LogicGateMultiplexer.desc: Signal Selectors can be used to select which automation signal is relevant to pass through to a given circuit

LogicGateDemultiplexer.name: Signal Distributor
LogicGateDemultiplexer.desc: Signal Distributors can be used to choose which circuit should receive a given automation signal.

LogicHEPSensor.name: Radbolt Sensor
LogicHEPSensor.desc: Radbolt sensors can send a signal when a Radbolt passes over them.

LogicHammer.name: Hammer
LogicHammer.desc: The hammer makes neat sounds when it strikes buildings.

LogicLightSensor.name: Light Sensor
LogicLightSensor.desc: Light sensors can tell surface bunker doors above solar panels to open or close based on solar light levels.

LogicMemory.name: Memory Toggle
LogicMemory.desc: A Memory stores a Green Signal received in the Set Port (S) until the Reset Port (R) receives a Green Signal.

LogicPowerRelay.name: Power Shutoff
LogicPowerRelay.desc: Automated systems save power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.

LogicPressureSensorGas.name: Atmo Sensor
LogicPressureSensorGas.desc: Atmo sensors can be used to prevent excess oxygen production and overpressurization.

LogicPressureSensorLiquid.name: Hydro Sensor
LogicPressureSensorLiquid.desc: A hydro sensor can tell a pump to refill its basin as soon as it contains too little liquid.

LogicRadiationSensor.name: Radiation Sensor
LogicRadiationSensor.desc: Radiation sensors can disable buildings when they detect dangerous levels of radiation.

LogicRibbonBridge.name: Automation Ribbon Bridge
LogicRibbonBridge.desc: Wire bridges allow multiple automation grids to exist in a small area without connecting.

LogicRibbon.name: Automation Ribbon
LogicRibbon.desc: Logic ribbons use significantly less space to carry multiple automation signals.

LogicRibbonReader.name: Ribbon Reader
LogicRibbonReader.desc: Inputs the signal from a single Bit in an Automation Ribbon into an Automation Wire.

LogicRibbonWriter.name: Ribbon Writer
LogicRibbonWriter.desc: Translates the signal from an Automation Wire to a single Bit in an Automation Ribbon

LogicSwitch.name: Signal Switch
LogicSwitch.desc: Signal switches don't turn grids on and off like power switches, but add an extra signal.

LogicTemperatureSensor.name: Thermo Sensor
LogicTemperatureSensor.desc: Thermo sensors can disable buildings when they approach dangerous temperatures.

LogicTimeOfDaySensor.name: Cycle Sensor
LogicTimeOfDaySensor.desc: Cycle sensors ensure systems always turn on at the same time, day or night, every cycle.

LogicTimerSensor.name: Timer Sensor
LogicTimerSensor.desc: Timer sensors create automation schedules for very short or very long periods of time.

LogicWattageSensor.name: Wattage Sensor
LogicWattageSensor.desc: Wattage sensors can send a signal when a building has switched on or off.

LogicWireBridge.name: Automation Wire Bridge
LogicWireBridge.desc: Wire bridges allow multiple automation grids to exist in a small area without connecting.

LogicWire.name: Automation Wire
LogicWire.desc: Automation wire is used to connect building ports to automation gates.

LonelyMinionHouse.name: Gravitas Shipping Container
LonelyMinionHouse.desc: Its occupant has been alone for so long, he's forgotten what friendship feels like.

LonelyMailBox.name: Mailbox
LonelyMailBox.desc: There's nothing quite like receiving homemade gifts in the mail.

LuxuryBed.name: Comfy Bed
LuxuryBed.desc: Duplicants prefer comfy beds to cots and wake up more rested after sleeping in them.

ManualGenerator.name: Manual Generator
ManualGenerator.desc: Watching Duplicants run on it is adorable... the electrical power is just an added bonus.

ManualHighEnergyParticleSpawner.name: Manual Radbolt Generator
ManualHighEnergyParticleSpawner.desc: Radbolts are necessary for producing Materials Science research.

ManualPressureDoor.name: Manual Airlock
ManualPressureDoor.desc: Airlocks can quarter off dangerous areas and prevent gases from seeping into the colony.

MarbleSculpture.name: Marble Block
MarbleSculpture.desc: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

MassageTable.name: Massage Table
MassageTable.desc: Massage tables quickly reduce extreme stress, at the cost of power production.

MechanicalSurfboard.name: Mechanical Surfboard
MechanicalSurfboard.desc: Mechanical waves make for radical relaxation time.

MedicalCot.name: Triage Cot
MedicalCot.desc: Duplicants use triage cots to recover from physical injuries and receive aid from peers.

MeshTile.name: Mesh Tile
MeshTile.desc: Mesh tile can be used to make Duplicant pathways in areas where liquid flows.

MetalRefinery.name: Metal Refinery
MetalRefinery.desc: Refined metals are necessary to build advanced electronics and technologies.

MetalSculpture.name: Metal Block
MetalSculpture.desc: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

MetalTile.name: Metal Tile
MetalTile.desc: Heat travels much more quickly through metal tile than other types of flooring.

MethaneGenerator.name: Natural Gas Generator
MethaneGenerator.desc: Natural gas generators leak polluted water and are best built above a waste reservoir.

MicrobeMusher.name: Microbe Musher
MicrobeMusher.desc: Musher recipes will keep Duplicants fed, but may impact health and morale over time.

MilkFatSeparator.name: Brackwax Gleaner
MilkFatSeparator.desc: Duplicants can slather up with brackwax to increase their travel speed in transit tubes.

MilkFeeder.name: Critter Fountain
MilkFeeder.desc: It's easier to tolerate overcrowding when you're all hopped up on brackene.

MilkPress.name: Plant Pulverizer
MilkPress.desc: For Duplicants who are too squeamish to milk critters.

MilkingStation.name: Milking Station
MilkingStation.desc: The harvested liquid is basically the equivalent of soda for critters.

MineralDeoxidizer.name: Oxygen Diffuser
MineralDeoxidizer.desc: Oxygen diffusers are inefficient, but output enough oxygen to keep a colony breathing.

MissileLauncher.name: Meteor Blaster
MissileLauncher.desc: Some meteors drop harvestable resources when they're blown to smithereens.

MissileFabricator.name: Blastshot Maker
MissileFabricator.desc: Blastshot shells are an effective defense against incoming meteor showers.

MissionControlCluster.name: Mission Control Station
MissionControlCluster.desc: Like a backseat driver who actually does know better.

ModularLaunchpadPortBridge.name: Rocket Port Extension
ModularLaunchpadPortBridge.desc: Allows rocket platforms to be built farther apart.

ModularLaunchpadPortGas.name: Gas Rocket Port Loader
ModularLaunchpadPortGas.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

ModularLaunchpadPortGasUnloader.name: Gas Rocket Port Unloader
ModularLaunchpadPortGasUnloader.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

ModularLaunchpadPortLiquid.name: Liquid Rocket Port Loader
ModularLaunchpadPortLiquid.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

ModularLaunchpadPortLiquidUnloader.name: Liquid Rocket Port Unloader
ModularLaunchpadPortLiquidUnloader.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

ModularLaunchpadPortSolid.name: Solid Rocket Port Loader
ModularLaunchpadPortSolid.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

ModularLaunchpadPortSolidUnloader.name: Solid Rocket Port Unloader
ModularLaunchpadPortSolidUnloader.desc: Rockets must be landed to load or unload resources.

MonumentBottom.name: Monument Base
MonumentBottom.desc: The base of a monument must be constructed first.

MonumentMiddle.name: Monument Midsection
MonumentMiddle.desc: Customized sections of a Great Monument can be mixed and matched.

MonumentTop.name: Monument Top
MonumentTop.desc: Building a Great Monument will declare to the universe that this hunk of rock is your own.

MorbRoverMaker.name: Biobot Builder
MorbRoverMaker.desc: Allows a skilled Duplicant to manufacture a steady supply of icky yet effective bots.

NoseconeBasic.name: Basic Nosecone
NoseconeBasic.desc: Every rocket requires a nosecone to fly.

NuclearReactor.name: Research Reactor
NuclearReactor.desc: Radbolt generators and reflectors make radiation useable by other buildings.

NuclearResearchCenter.name: Materials Study Terminal
NuclearResearchCenter.desc: Comes with a few ions thrown in, free of charge.

ObjectDispenser.name: Automatic Dispenser
ObjectDispenser.desc: Automatic dispensers will store and drop resources in small quantities.

OilRefinery.name: Oil Refinery
OilRefinery.desc: Petroleum can only be produced from the refinement of crude oil.

OilWellCap.name: Oil Well
OilWellCap.desc: Water pumped into an oil reservoir cannot be recovered.

OrbitalCargoModule.name: Orbital Cargo Module
OrbitalCargoModule.desc: It's a generally good idea to pack some supplies when exploring unknown worlds.

OrbitalResearchCenter.name: Orbital Data Collection Lab
OrbitalResearchCenter.desc: Orbital Data Collection Labs record data while orbiting a Planetoid and write it to a Data Bank.

OreScrubber.name: Ore Scrubber
OreScrubber.desc: Scrubbers sanitize freshly mined materials before they're brought into the colony.

Outhouse.name: Outhouse
Outhouse.desc: The colony that eats together, excretes together.

OxidizerTankCluster.name: Large Solid Oxidizer Tank
OxidizerTankCluster.desc: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.

OxidizerTankLiquidCluster.name: Liquid Oxidizer Tank
OxidizerTankLiquidCluster.desc: Liquid oxygen improves the thrust-to-mass ratio of rocket fuels.

OxygenMaskLocker.name: Oxygen Mask Dock
OxygenMaskLocker.desc: An oxygen mask dock will store and refill masks while they're not in use.

OxygenMaskMarker.name: Oxygen Mask Checkpoint
OxygenMaskMarker.desc: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.

OxyliteRefinery.name: Oxylite Refinery
OxyliteRefinery.desc: Oxylite is a solid and easily transportable source of consumable oxygen.

ParkSign.name: Park Sign
ParkSign.desc: Passing through parks will increase Duplicant Morale.

PetroleumGenerator.name: Petroleum Generator
PetroleumGenerator.desc: Petroleum generators have a high energy output but produce a great deal of waste.

Phonobox.name: Jukebot
Phonobox.desc: Dancing helps Duplicants get their innermost feelings out.

PioneerModule.name: Trailblazer Module
PioneerModule.desc: That's one small step for Dupekind.

PixelPack.name: Pixel Pack
PixelPack.desc: Four pixels which can be individually designated different colors.

PlanterBox.name: Planter Box
PlanterBox.desc: Domestically grown seeds mature more quickly than wild plants.

PlasticTile.name: Plastic Tile
PlasticTile.desc: Plastic tile is mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.

Polymerizer.name: Polymer Press
Polymerizer.desc: Plastic can be used to craft unique buildings and goods.

PowerControlStation.name: Power Control Station
PowerControlStation.desc: Only one Duplicant may be assigned to a station at a time.

PowerTransformer.name: Large Power Transformer
PowerTransformer.desc: It's a power transformer, but larger.

PowerTransformerSmall.name: Power Transformer
PowerTransformerSmall.desc: Limiting the power drawn by wires prevents them from incurring overload damage.

PressureDoor.name: Mechanized Airlock
PressureDoor.desc: Mechanized airlocks open and close more quickly than other types of door.

RadiationLight.name: Radiation Lamp
RadiationLight.desc: Duplicants can become sick if exposed to radiation without protection.

RailGun.name: Interplanetary Launcher
RailGun.desc: It's tempting to climb inside but trust me... don't.

RailGunPayloadOpener.name: Payload Opener
RailGunPayloadOpener.desc: Payload openers can be hooked up to conveyors, plumbing and ventilation for improved sorting.

RanchStation.name: Grooming Station
RanchStation.desc: Grooming critters make them look nice, smell pretty, feel happy, and produce more.

RationBox.name: Ration Box
RationBox.desc: Ration boxes keep food safe from hungry critters, but don't slow food spoilage.

Refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
Refrigerator.desc: Food spoilage can be slowed by ambient conditions as well as by refrigerators.

ResearchCenter.name: Research Station
ResearchCenter.desc: Research stations are necessary for unlocking all research tiers.

ResetSkillsStation.name: Skill Scrubber
ResetSkillsStation.desc: Erase skills from a Duplicant's mind, returning them to their default abilities.

RockCrusher.name: Rock Crusher
RockCrusher.desc: Rock Crushers loosen nuggets from raw ore and can process many different resources.

RocketControlStation.name: Rocket Control Station
RocketControlStation.desc: Someone needs to be around to jiggle the controls when the screensaver comes on.

RocketEnvelopeWindowTile.name: Rocket Window
RocketEnvelopeWindowTile.desc: I can see my asteroid from here!

RocketInteriorGasInputPort.name: Gas Spacefarer Input Port
RocketInteriorGasInputPort.desc: A direct attachment leading to the output port on the exterior of the rocket.

RocketInteriorGasOutputPort.name: Gas Spacefarer Output Port
RocketInteriorGasOutputPort.desc: A direct attachment to the input port on the exterior of a rocket.

RocketInteriorLiquidInputPort.name: Liquid Spacefarer Input Port
RocketInteriorLiquidInputPort.desc: A direct attachment to the output port on the exterior of a rocket.

RocketInteriorLiquidOutput.name: Liquid Output Fitting
RocketInteriorLiquidOutput.desc: Now if only we had some water balloons...

RocketInteriorLiquidOutputPort.name: Liquid Spacefarer Output Port
RocketInteriorLiquidOutputPort.desc: A direct attachment to the input port on the exterior of a rocket.

RocketInteriorPowerPlug.name: Power Outlet Fitting
RocketInteriorPowerPlug.desc: Outlets conveniently power buildings inside a cockpit using their rocket's power stores.

RocketInteriorSolidInput.name: Conveyor Receptacle Fitting
RocketInteriorSolidInput.desc: Why organize your shelves when you can just shove everything in here?

RocketInteriorSolidOutput.name: Conveyor Loader Fitting
RocketInteriorSolidOutput.desc: For accessing your stored luggage mid-flight.

RustDeoxidizer.name: Rust Deoxidizer
RustDeoxidizer.desc: Rust and salt goes in, oxygen comes out.

Sauna.name: Sauna
Sauna.desc: A steamy sauna soothes away all the aches and pains.

ScannerModule.name: Cartographic Module
ScannerModule.desc: Allows Duplicants to boldly go where other Duplicants haven't been yet.

ScoutModule.name: Rover's Module
ScoutModule.desc: Rover can conduct explorations of planetoids that don't have rocket platforms built.

Sculpture.name: Large Sculpting Block
Sculpture.desc: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

ShearingStation.name: Shearing Station
ShearingStation.desc: Those critters aren't gonna shear themselves.

Shower.name: Shower
Shower.desc: Regularly showering will prevent Duplicants spreading germs to the things they touch.

SludgePress.name: Sludge Press
SludgePress.desc: What Duplicant doesn't love playing with mud?

SmallOxidizerTank.name: Small Solid Oxidizer Tank
SmallOxidizerTank.desc: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.

SmallSculpture.name: Sculpting Block
SmallSculpture.desc: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

SodaFountain.name: Soda Fountain
SodaFountain.desc: Sparkling water puts a twinkle in a Duplicant's eye.

SolarPanel.name: Solar Panel
SolarPanel.desc: Solar panels convert high intensity sunlight into power and produce zero waste.

SolarPanelModule.name: Solar Panel Module
SolarPanelModule.desc: Collect solar energy before takeoff and during flight.

CargoBayCluster.name: Large Cargo Bay
CargoBayCluster.desc: Holds more than a regular cargo bay.

SolidCargoBaySmall.name: Cargo Bay
SolidCargoBaySmall.desc: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.

SolidConduitBridge.name: Conveyor Bridge
SolidConduitBridge.desc: Separating rail systems helps ensure materials go to the intended destinations.

SolidConduit.name: Conveyor Rail
SolidConduit.desc: Rails move materials where they'll be needed most, saving Duplicants the walk.

SolidConduitInbox.name: Conveyor Loader
SolidConduitInbox.desc: Material filters can be used to determine what resources are sent down the rail.

SolidConduitOutbox.name: Conveyor Receptacle
SolidConduitOutbox.desc: When materials reach the end of a rail they enter a receptacle to be used by Duplicants.

SolidConduitDiseaseSensor.name: Conveyor Rail Germ Sensor
SolidConduitDiseaseSensor.desc: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.

SolidConduitElementSensor.name: Conveyor Rail Element Sensor
SolidConduitElementSensor.desc: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific item on a rail.

SolidConduitTemperatureSensor.name: Conveyor Rail Thermo Sensor
SolidConduitTemperatureSensor.desc: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their rail contents reach a certain temperature.

SolidFilter.name: Solid Filter
SolidFilter.desc: All solids are sent into the building's output conveyor, except the solid chosen for filtering.

SolidLimitValve.name: Conveyor Meter
SolidLimitValve.desc: Conveyor Meters let an exact amount of materials pass through before shutting off.

SolidLogicValve.name: Conveyor Shutoff
SolidLogicValve.desc: Automated conveyors save power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.

SolidTransferArm.name: Auto-Sweeper
SolidTransferArm.desc: An auto-sweeper's range can be viewed at any time by (ClickType/clicking) on the building.

SolidVent.name: Conveyor Chute
SolidVent.desc: When materials reach the end of a rail they are dropped back into the world.

SpaceHeater.name: Space Heater
SpaceHeater.desc: A space heater will radiate heat for as long as it's powered.

SpecialCargoBayCluster.name: Critter Cargo Bay
SpecialCargoBayCluster.desc: Critters do not require feeding during transit.

SpiceGrinder.name: Spice Grinder
SpiceGrinder.desc: Crushed seeds and other edibles make excellent meal-enhancing additives.

SteamEngineCluster.name: Steam Engine
SteamEngineCluster.desc: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.

SteamTurbine2.name: Steam Turbine
SteamTurbine2.desc: Useful for converting the geothermal energy into usable power.

StorageLocker.name: Storage Bin
StorageLocker.desc: Resources left on the floor become "debris" and lower decor when not put away.

StorageLockerSmart.name: Smart Storage Bin
StorageLockerSmart.desc: Smart storage bins can automate resource organization based on type and mass.

StorageTile.name: Storage Tile
StorageTile.desc: Storage tiles keep selected non-edible solids out of the way.

SublimationStation.name: Sublimation Station
SublimationStation.desc: Sublimation is the sublime process by which solids convert directly into gas.

SugarEngine.name: Sugar Engine
SugarEngine.desc: Not the most stylish way to travel space, but certainly the tastiest.

SuitFabricator.name: Exosuit Forge
SuitFabricator.desc: Exosuits can be filled with oxygen to allow Duplicants to safely enter hazardous areas.

SuitLocker.name: Atmo Suit Dock
SuitLocker.desc: An atmo suit dock will empty atmo suits of waste, but only one suit can charge at a time.

SuitMarker.name: Atmo Suit Checkpoint
SuitMarker.desc: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.

SupermaterialRefinery.name: Molecular Forge
SupermaterialRefinery.desc: Rare materials can be procured through rocket missions into space.

SweepBotStation.name: Sweepy's Dock
SweepBotStation.desc: The cute little face comes pre-installed.

Switch.name: Switch
Switch.desc: Switches can only affect buildings that come after them on a circuit.

Telephone.name: Party Line Phone
Telephone.desc: You never know who you'll meet on the other line.

TeleportalPad.name: Teleporter Pad
TeleportalPad.desc: Duplicants are just atoms as far as the pad's concerned.

TemporalTearOpener.name: Temporal Tear Opener
TemporalTearOpener.desc: Infinite possibilities, with a complimentary side of meteor showers.

ThermalBlock.name: Tempshift Plate
ThermalBlock.desc: The thermal properties of construction materials determine their heat retention.

Tile.name: Tile
Tile.desc: Tile can be used to bridge gaps and get to unreachable areas.

TravelTube.name: Transit Tube
TravelTube.desc: Duplicants will only exit a transit tube when a safe landing area is available beneath it.

TravelTubeEntrance.name: Transit Tube Access
TravelTubeEntrance.desc: Duplicants require access points to enter tubes, but not to exit them.

TravelTubeWallBridge.name: Transit Tube Crossing
TravelTubeWallBridge.desc: Tube crossings can run transit tubes through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

UnderwaterCritterCondo.name: Water Fort
UnderwaterCritterCondo.desc: Even wild critters are happier after they've had a little R&R.

UraniumCentrifuge.name: Uranium Centrifuge
UraniumCentrifuge.desc: Enriched uranium is a specialized substance that can be used to fuel powerful research reactors.

VerticalWindTunnel.name: Vertical Wind Tunnel
VerticalWindTunnel.desc: Duplicants love the feeling of high-powered wind through their hair.

WallToilet.name: Wall Toilet
WallToilet.desc: Wall Toilets transmit fewer germs to Duplicants and require no emptying.

WarpConduitReceiver.name: Supply Teleporter Output
WarpConduitReceiver.desc: The tubes at the back disappear into nowhere.

WarpConduitSender.name: Supply Teleporter Input
WarpConduitSender.desc: The tubes at the back disappear into nowhere.

WashBasin.name: Wash Basin
WashBasin.desc: Germ spread can be reduced by building these where Duplicants often get dirty.

WashSink.name: Sink
WashSink.desc: Sinks are plumbed and do not need to be manually emptied or refilled.

WaterCooler.name: Water Cooler
WaterCooler.desc: Chatting with friends improves Duplicants' moods and reduces their stress.

WaterPurifier.name: Water Sieve
WaterPurifier.desc: Sieves cannot kill germs and pass any they receive into their waste and water output.

WireBridge.name: Wire Bridge
WireBridge.desc: Splitting generators onto separate grids can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.

WireBridgeHighWattage.name: Heavi-Watt Joint Plate
WireBridgeHighWattage.desc: Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Wire.name: Wire
Wire.desc: Electrical wire is used to connect generators, batteries, and buildings.

HighWattageWire.name: Heavi-Watt Wire
HighWattageWire.desc: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.

WireRefinedBridge.name: Conductive Wire Bridge
WireRefinedBridge.desc: Splitting generators onto separate systems can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.

WireRefinedBridgeHighWattage.name: Heavi-Watt Conductive Joint Plate
WireRefinedBridgeHighWattage.desc: Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

WireRefined.name: Conductive Wire
WireRefined.desc: My Duplicants prefer the look of conductive wire to the regular raggedy stuff.

WireRefinedHighWattage.name: Heavi-Watt Conductive Wire
WireRefinedHighWattage.desc: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.

WoodGasGenerator.name: Wood Burner
WoodGasGenerator.desc: Wood burners are small and easy to maintain, but produce a fair amount of heat.

CreatureAirTrap.name: Airborne Critter Trap
CreatureAirTrap.desc: It needs to be armed prior to use.

Desalinator.name: Desalinator
Desalinator.desc: Salt can be refined into table salt for a mealtime morale boost.

CreatureGroundTrap.name: Critter Trap
CreatureGroundTrap.desc: It's designed for land critters, but flopping fish sometimes find their way in too.

WaterTrap.name: Fish Trap
WaterTrap.desc: Trapped fish will automatically be bagged for transport.

Algae.name: Algae
Algae.desc:
Algae is a cluster of non-motile, single-celled lifeforms.

It can be used to produce Oxygen when used in an Oxygen Diffuser.

BleachStone.name: Bleach Stone
BleachStone.desc:
Bleach stone is an unstable compound that emits unbreathable Chlorine Gas.

It is useful in Hygienic processes.

DirtyWater.name: Polluted Water
DirtyWater.desc:
Polluted Water is dirty, unfiltered Water.

It is not fit for consumption.

NuclearWaste.name: Liquid Nuclear Waste
NuclearWaste.desc: Highly toxic liquid full of Radioactive Contaminants which emit Radiation that can be absorbed by Radbolt Generators.

OxyRock.name: Oxylite
OxyRock.desc:
(Ir3O2) Oxylite is a chemical compound that slowly emits breathable Oxygen.

Excavating Oxylite increases its emission rate, but depletes the ore more rapidly.

SlimeMold.name: Slime
SlimeMold.desc:
Slime is a thick biomixture of algae, fungi, and mucopolysaccharides.

It can be distilled into Algae and emits Polluted Oxygen once dug up.

ToxicSand.name: Polluted Dirt
ToxicSand.desc:
Polluted Dirt is unprocessed biological waste.

It emits Polluted Oxygen over time.

CrushedIce.name: Crushed Ice
CrushedIce.desc: (H<sub>2</sub>O) A slush of crushed, semi-solid ice.

Diamond.name: Diamond
Diamond.desc:
(C) Diamond is industrial-grade, high density carbon.

It is very difficult to excavate.

Isoresin.name: Isoresin
Isoresin.desc:
Isoresin is a crystallized sap composed of long-chain polymers.

It is used in the production of rare, high grade materials.

Sucrose.name: Sucrose
Sucrose.desc:
(C12H22O11) Sucrose is the raw form of sugar.

It can be used directly for cooking, or refined and eaten with meals to increase Duplicant Morale.

MilkFat.name: Brackwax
MilkFat.desc: Brackwax is a Solid byproduct of Brackene.

Niobium.name: Niobium
Niobium.desc: (Nb) Niobium is a rare metal with many practical applications in metallurgy and superconductor Research.

MilkIce.name: Frozen Brackene
MilkIce.desc: Frozen Brackene is Brackene frozen into a Solid state.

Cuprite.name: Copper Ore
Cuprite.desc:
(Cu2O) Copper Ore is a conductive Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

Copper.name: Copper
Copper.desc:
(Cu) Copper is a conductive Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

CrushedRock.name: Crushed Rock
CrushedRock.desc: Crushed Rock is Igneous Rock crushed into a mechanical mixture.

SuperInsulator.name: Insulite
SuperInsulator.desc: Insulite reduces Heat Transfer and is composed of recrystallized Abyssalite.

BrineIce.name: Brine Ice
BrineIce.desc:
Brine Ice is a natural, highly concentrated solution of Salt dissolved in Water and frozen into a Solid state.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.

SolidViscoGel.name: Solid Visco-Gel
SolidViscoGel.desc:
Visco-Gel is a polymer that has high surface tension when in Liquid form.

This selection is in a Solid state.

Ceramic.name: Ceramic
Ceramic.desc:
Ceramic is a hard, brittle material formed from heated Clay.

It is a reliable Construction Material.

Cobaltite.name: Cobalt Ore
Cobaltite.desc:
(Co) Cobalt Ore is a blue-hued Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

Fertilizer.name: Fertilizer
Fertilizer.desc:
Fertilizer is a processed mixture of biological nutrients.

It aids in the growth of certain Plants.

Wolframite.name: Wolframite
Wolframite.desc:
((Fe,Mn)WO4) Wolframite is a dense Metallic element in a Solid state.

It is a source of Tungsten and is suitable for building Power systems.

Polypropylene.name: Plastic
Polypropylene.desc:
(C3H6)n Plastic is a thermoplastic polymer.

It is useful for constructing a variety of advanced buildings and equipment.

SolidNaphtha.name: Solid Naphtha
SolidNaphtha.desc: Naphtha is a distilled hydrocarbon mixture in a Solid state.

Tungsten.name: Tungsten
Tungsten.desc:
(W) Tungsten is an extremely tough crystalline Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

RefinedCarbon.name: Refined Carbon
RefinedCarbon.desc: (C) Refined carbon is solid element purified from raw Coal.

Steel.name: Steel
Steel.desc: Steel is a Metal Alloy composed of iron and carbon.

Phosphorite.name: Phosphorite
Phosphorite.desc: Phosphorite is a composite of sedimentary rock, saturated with phosphate.

SolidHydrogen.name: Solid Hydrogen
SolidHydrogen.desc: (H) Solid Hydrogen is the universe's most common element in a Solid state.

Lead.name: Lead
Lead.desc:
(Pb) Lead is a soft yet extremely dense Refined Metal.

It has a low Overheat Temperature and is suitable for building Power systems.

Sulfur.name: Sulfur
Sulfur.desc:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of Natural Gas production.

This selection is in a Solid state.

Lime.name: Lime
Lime.desc:
(CaCO3) Lime is a mineral commonly found in Critter egg shells.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

SolidChlorine.name: Solid Chlorine
SolidChlorine.desc: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural Germ-killing element in a Solid state.

SolidNuclearWaste.name: Solid Nuclear Waste
SolidNuclearWaste.desc: Highly toxic solid full of Radioactive Contaminants.

Obsidian.name: Obsidian
Obsidian.desc: Obsidian is a brittle composite of volcanic Glass.

SolidPetroleum.name: Solid Petroleum
SolidPetroleum.desc:
Petroleum is a Power source.

This selection is in a Solid state.

SolidSuperCoolant.name: Solid Super Coolant
SolidSuperCoolant.desc:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade Fullerene coolant.

This selection is in a Solid state.

IgneousRock.name: Igneous Rock
IgneousRock.desc:
Igneous Rock is a composite of solidified volcanic rock.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

EnrichedUranium.name: Enriched Uranium
EnrichedUranium.desc:
(U) Enriched Uranium is a highly Radioactive, refined substance.

It is primarily used to Power potent research reactors.

Gold.name: Gold
Gold.desc:
(Au) Gold is a conductive precious Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

Rust.name: Rust
Rust.desc:
Rust is an iron oxide that forms from the breakdown of Iron.

It is useful in some Oxygen production processes.

Corium.name: Corium
Corium.desc:
A radioactive mixture of nuclear waste and melted reactor materials.

Releases Nuclear Fallout gas.

Phosphorus.name: Refined Phosphorus
Phosphorus.desc: (P) Refined Phosphorus is a chemical element in its Solid state.

Granite.name: Granite
Granite.desc:
Granite is a dense composite of Igneous Rock.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

SolidCarbonDioxide.name: Solid Carbon Dioxide
SolidCarbonDioxide.desc: (CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable compound in a Solid state.

Cobalt.name: Cobalt
Cobalt.desc: (Co) Cobalt is a Refined Metal made from Cobalt Ore.

UraniumOre.name: Uranium Ore
UraniumOre.desc:
(U) Uranium Ore is a highly Radioactive substance.

It can be refined into fuel for research reactors.

SolidPropane.name: Solid Propane
SolidPropane.desc: (C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Solid Propane is a natural gas in a Solid state.

AluminumOre.name: Aluminum Ore
AluminumOre.desc:
Aluminum ore, also known as Bauxite, is a sedimentary rock high in metal content.

It can be refined into Aluminum.

SedimentaryRock.name: Sedimentary Rock
SedimentaryRock.desc:
Sedimentary Rock is a hardened composite of sediment layers.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

Fullerene.name: Fullerene
Fullerene.desc: (C<sub>60</sub>) Fullerene is a form of Coal consisting of spherical molecules.

GoldAmalgam.name: Gold Amalgam
GoldAmalgam.desc:
Gold Amalgam is a conductive amalgam of gold and mercury.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.desc:
(NaCl) Salt, also known as sodium chloride, is an edible chemical compound.

When refined, it can be eaten with meals to increase Duplicant Morale.

Sand.name: Sand
Sand.desc:
Sand is a composite of granular rock.

It is useful as a Filtration Medium.

Snow.name: Snow
Snow.desc:
(H2O) Snow is a mass of loose, crystalline ice particles.

It becomes Water when melted.

SandStone.name: Sandstone
SandStone.desc:
Sandstone is a composite of relatively soft sedimentary rock.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

Glass.name: Glass
Glass.desc: Glass is a brittle, transparent substance formed from Sand fired at high temperatures.

Clay.name: Clay
Clay.desc:
Clay is a soft, naturally occurring composite of stone and soil that hardens at high Temperatures.

It is a reliable Construction Material.

Ice.name: Ice
Ice.desc: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Ice is clean water frozen into a Solid state.

Graphite.name: Graphite
Graphite.desc:
(C) Graphite is the most stable form of carbon.

It has high thermal conductivity and is useful as a Construction Material.

ToxicMud.name: Polluted Mud
ToxicMud.desc:
A mixture of Polluted Dirt and Polluted Water.

Can be separated into its base elements using a Sludge Press.

Mud.name: Mud
Mud.desc:
A mixture of Dirt and Water.

Can be separated into its base elements using a Sludge Press.

Carbon.name: Coal
Carbon.desc:
(C) Coal is a combustible fossil fuel composed of carbon.

It is useful in Power production.

SolidOxygen.name: Solid Oxygen
SolidOxygen.desc: (O<sub>2</sub>) Solid Oxygen is a breathable element in a Solid state.

Creature.name: Genetic Ooze
Creature.desc:
(DuPe) Ooze is a slurry of water, carbon, and dozens and dozens of trace elements.

Duplicants are printed from pure Ooze.

DepletedUranium.name: Depleted Uranium
DepletedUranium.desc:
(U) Depleted Uranium is Uranium with a low U-235 content.

It is created as a byproduct of Enriched Uranium and is no longer suitable as fuel.

Katairite.name: Abyssalite
Katairite.desc: (Ab) Abyssalite is a resilient, crystalline element.

SolidMethane.name: Solid Methane
SolidMethane.desc: (CH<sub>4</sub>) Methane is an alkane in a Solid state.

HardPolypropylene.name: Plastium
HardPolypropylene.desc:
Plastium is an advanced thermoplastic polymer made from Thermium, Plastic and Brackwax.

It is highly heat-resistant and suitable for use in space buildings.

MaficRock.name: Mafic Rock
MaficRock.desc:
Mafic Rock is a variation of Igneous Rock that is rich in Iron.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

Iron.name: Iron
Iron.desc: (Fe) Iron is a common industrial Metal.

Regolith.name: Regolith
Regolith.desc:
Regolith is a sandy substance composed of the various particles that collect atop terrestrial objects.

It is useful as a Filtration Medium.

SolidResin.name: Solid Resin
SolidResin.desc:
Solidified goo harvested from a grumpy tree.

It is used in the production of Isoresin.

TempConductorSolid.name: Thermium
TempConductorSolid.desc: Thermium is an industrial metal alloy formulated to maximize Heat Transfer and thermal dispersion.

IronOre.name: Iron Ore
IronOre.desc:
(Fe) Iron Ore is a soft Metal.

It is suitable for building Power systems.

Dirt.name: Dirt
Dirt.desc:
Dirt is a soft, nutrient-rich substance capable of supporting life.

It is necessary in some forms of Food production.

DirtyIce.name: Polluted Ice
DirtyIce.desc: Polluted Ice is dirty, unfiltered water frozen into a Solid state.

Fossil.name: Fossil
Fossil.desc:
Fossil is organic matter, highly compressed and hardened into a mineral state.

It is useful as a Construction Material.

Unobtanium.name: Neutronium
Unobtanium.desc:
(Nt) Neutronium is a mysterious and extremely resilient element.

It cannot be excavated by any Duplicant mining tool.

SolidEthanol.name: Solid Ethanol
SolidEthanol.desc:
(C2H6O) Solid Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound.

It can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.

FoolsGold.name: Pyrite
FoolsGold.desc:
(FeS2) Pyrite is a conductive Metal.

Also known as "Fool's Gold", is suitable for building Power systems.

Aluminum.name: Aluminum
Aluminum.desc:
(Al) Aluminum is a low density Metal.

It has high Thermal Conductivity and is suitable for building Power systems.

LiquidOxygen.name: Liquid Oxygen
LiquidOxygen.desc:
(O2) Oxygen is a breathable chemical.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

ViscoGel.name: Visco-Gel Fluid
ViscoGel.desc: Visco-Gel Fluid is a Liquid polymer with high surface tension, preventing typical liquid flow and allowing for unusual configurations.

MoltenAluminum.name: Molten Aluminum
MoltenAluminum.desc: (Al) Molten Aluminum is a low density Metal heated into a Liquid state.

MoltenLead.name: Molten Lead
MoltenLead.desc: (Pb) Lead is an extremely dense Refined Metal heated into a Liquid state.

LiquidCarbonDioxide.name: Liquid Carbon Dioxide
LiquidCarbonDioxide.desc:
(CO2) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable chemical compound.

This selection is currently in a Liquid state.

CrudeOil.name: Crude Oil
CrudeOil.desc: Crude Oil is a raw potential Power source composed of billions of dead, primordial organisms.

MoltenGlass.name: Molten Glass
MoltenGlass.desc: Molten Glass is a composite of granular rock, heated into a Liquid state.

LiquidSulfur.name: Liquid Sulfur
LiquidSulfur.desc:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of Natural Gas production.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

MoltenGold.name: Molten Gold
MoltenGold.desc: (Au) Gold, a conductive precious Metal, heated into a Liquid state.

Magma.name: Magma
Magma.desc: Magma is a composite of Igneous Rock heated into a molten, Liquid state.

Chlorine.name: Liquid Chlorine
Chlorine.desc: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural Germ-killing element in a Liquid state.

LiquidHydrogen.name: Liquid Hydrogen
LiquidHydrogen.desc:
(H) Hydrogen in its Liquid state.

It freezes most substances that come into contact with it.

Resin.name: Liquid Resin
Resin.desc:
Sticky goo harvested from a grumpy tree.

It can be polymerized into Isoresin by boiling away its excess moisture.

LiquidPropane.name: Liquid Propane
LiquidPropane.desc:
(C3H8) Propane is an alkane.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

It is useful in Power production.

MoltenTungsten.name: Molten Tungsten
MoltenTungsten.desc: (W) Molten Tungsten is a crystalline Metal heated into a Liquid state.

Petroleum.name: Petroleum
Petroleum.desc:
Petroleum is a Power source refined from Crude Oil.

It is also an essential ingredient in the production of Plastic.

MoltenSalt.name: Molten Salt
MoltenSalt.desc: (NaCl) Molten Salt is an edible chemical compound that has been heated into a Liquid state.

MoltenCobalt.name: Molten Cobalt
MoltenCobalt.desc: (Co) Molten Cobalt is a Refined Metal heated into a Liquid state.

Brine.name: Brine
Brine.desc:
Brine is a natural, highly concentrated solution of Salt dissolved in Water.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.

SuperCoolant.name: Super Coolant
SuperCoolant.desc:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade coolant that utilizes the unusual energy states of Fullerene.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

Ethanol.name: Ethanol
Ethanol.desc:
(C2H6O) Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound in a Liquid state.

It can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.

Milk.name: Brackene
Milk.desc:
Brackene is a sodium-rich Liquid.

It is useful in Ranching.

LiquidMethane.name: Liquid Methane
LiquidMethane.desc:
(CH4) Methane is an alkane.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

MoltenIron.name: Molten Iron
MoltenIron.desc: (Fe) Molten Iron is a common industrial Metal heated into a Liquid state.

MoltenCarbon.name: Liquid Carbon
MoltenCarbon.desc: (C) Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a Liquid state.

Naphtha.name: Liquid Naphtha
Naphtha.desc: Naphtha a distilled hydrocarbon mixture produced from the burning of Plastic.

MoltenSucrose.name: Liquid Sucrose
MoltenSucrose.desc:
(C12H22O11) Sucrose is the raw form of sugar, heated into a Liquid state.

It can be used directly for cooking, or refined and eaten with meals to increase Duplicant Morale.

LiquidPhosphorus.name: Liquid Phosphorus
LiquidPhosphorus.desc:
(P) Phosphorus is a chemical element.

This selection is in a Liquid state.

MoltenSteel.name: Molten Steel
MoltenSteel.desc: Molten Steel is a Metal alloy of iron and carbon, heated into a hazardous Liquid state.

MoltenNiobium.name: Molten Niobium
MoltenNiobium.desc: (Nb) Molten Niobium is a rare metal heated into a Liquid state.

SaltWater.name: Salt Water
SaltWater.desc:
Salt Water is a natural, lightly concentrated solution of Salt dissolved in Water.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.

MoltenUranium.name: Liquid Uranium
MoltenUranium.desc:
(U) Liquid Uranium is a highly Radioactive substance, heated into a hazardous Liquid state.

It is a byproduct of Enriched Uranium.

MoltenCopper.name: Molten Copper
MoltenCopper.desc: (Cu) Molten Copper is a conductive Metal heated into a Liquid state.

SulfurGas.name: Sulfur Gas
SulfurGas.desc:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of Natural Gas production.

This selection is in a Gaseous state.

SaltGas.name: Salt Gas
SaltGas.desc: (NaCl) Salt Gas is an edible chemical compound that has been superheated into a Gaseous state.

NiobiumGas.name: Niobium Gas
NiobiumGas.desc:
(Nb) Niobium Gas is a rare metal.

This selection is in a Gaseous state.

Oxygen.name: Oxygen
Oxygen.desc:
(O2) Oxygen is an atomically lightweight and breathable Gas, necessary for sustaining life.

It tends to rise above other gases.

CobaltGas.name: Cobalt Gas
CobaltGas.desc: (Co) Cobalt is a Refined Metal, heated into a Gas.

SteelGas.name: Steel Gas
SteelGas.desc: Steel Gas is a superheated Metal Gas composed of iron and carbon.

ChlorineGas.name: Chlorine Gas
ChlorineGas.desc: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural Germ-killing element in a Gaseous state.

Hydrogen.name: Hydrogen Gas
Hydrogen.desc: (H) Hydrogen Gas is the universe's most common and atomically light element in a Gaseous state.

SourGas.name: Sour Gas
SourGas.desc:
Sour Gas is a hydrocarbon Gas containing high concentrations of hydrogen sulfide.

It is a byproduct of highly heated Petroleum.

Steam.name: Steam
Steam.desc: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Steam is Water that has been heated into a scalding Gas.

Methane.name: Natural Gas
Methane.desc:
Natural Gas is a mixture of various alkanes in a Gaseous state.

It is useful in Power production.

GoldGas.name: Gold Gas
GoldGas.desc: (Au) Gold Gas is a conductive precious Metal, heated into a Gaseous state.

EthanolGas.name: Ethanol Gas
EthanolGas.desc: (C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Ethanol Gas is an advanced chemical compound heated into a Gaseous state.

RockGas.name: Rock Gas
RockGas.desc: Rock Gas is rock that has been superheated into a Gaseous state.

CarbonGas.name: Carbon Gas
CarbonGas.desc: (C) Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a Gaseous state.

SuperCoolantGas.name: Super Coolant Gas
SuperCoolantGas.desc:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade Fullerene coolant.

This selection is in a Gaseous state.

AluminumGas.name: Aluminum Gas
AluminumGas.desc: (Al) Aluminum Gas is a low density Metal heated into a Gaseous state.

TungstenGas.name: Tungsten Gas
TungstenGas.desc:
(W) Tungsten is a superheated crystalline Metal.

This selection is in a Gaseous state.

ContaminatedOxygen.name: Polluted Oxygen
ContaminatedOxygen.desc:
(O2) Polluted Oxygen is dirty, unfiltered air.

It is breathable.

LeadGas.name: Lead Gas
LeadGas.desc: (Pb) Lead Gas is a soft yet extremely dense Refined Metal heated into a Gaseous.

Fallout.name: Nuclear Fallout
Fallout.desc: Nuclear Fallout is a highly toxic gas full of Radioactive Contaminants. Condenses into Liquid Nuclear Waste.

IronGas.name: Iron Gas
IronGas.desc: (Fe) Iron Gas is a common industrial Metal, heated into a Gas.

PhosphorusGas.name: Phosphorus Gas
PhosphorusGas.desc: (P) Phosphorus Gas is the Gaseous state of Refined Phosphorus.

CarbonDioxide.name: Carbon Dioxide
CarbonDioxide.desc:
(CO2) Carbon Dioxide is an atomically heavy chemical compound in a Gaseous state.

It tends to sink below other gases.

CopperGas.name: Copper Gas
CopperGas.desc: (Cu) Copper Gas is a conductive Metal heated into a Gas state.

ClustercraftInteriorDoor.name: Interior Hatch
ClustercraftInteriorDoor.desc: A hatch for getting in and out of the rocket.

artifact_sandstone.name: Sandstone
artifact_sandstone.desc: A beautiful rock composed of multiple layers of sediment.

artifact_sink.name: Sink
artifact_sink.desc: No collection is complete without it.

artifact_rubikscube.name: Rubik's Cube
artifact_rubikscube.desc: This mystery of the universe has already been solved.

artifact_officemug.name: Office Mug
artifact_officemug.desc: An intermediary place to store espresso before you move it to your mouth.

artifact_obelisk.name: Small Obelisk
artifact_obelisk.desc:
A rectangular stone piece.

Its function is unclear.

artifact_okayxray.name: Old X-Ray
artifact_okayxray.desc: Ew, weird. It has five fingers!

artifact_blender.name: Blender
artifact_blender.desc: Equipment used to conduct experiments answering the age-old question, "Could that blend"?

artifact_moldavite.name: Moldavite
artifact_moldavite.desc: A unique green stone formed from the impact of a meteorite.

artifact_vhs.name: Archaic Tech
artifact_vhs.desc: Be kind when you handle it. It's very fragile.

artifact_saxophone.name: Mangled Saxophone
artifact_saxophone.desc: The name "Pesquet" is barely legible on the inside.

artifact_honeyjar.name: Honey Jar
artifact_honeyjar.desc: Sweet golden liquid with just a touch of uranium.

artifact_ameliaswatch.name: Wrist Watch
artifact_ameliaswatch.desc: It was discovered in a package labeled "To be entrusted to Dr. Walker".

artifact_teapot.name: Encrusted Teapot
artifact_teapot.desc: A teapot from the depths of space, coated in a thick layer of Neutronium.

artifact_shieldgenerator.name: Shield Generator
artifact_shieldgenerator.desc: A mechanical prototype capable of producing a small section of shielding.

artifact_bioluminescentrock.name: Bioluminescent Rock
artifact_bioluminescentrock.desc: A thriving colony of tiny, microscopic organisms is responsible for giving it its bluish glow.

artifact_grubstatue.name: Grubgrub Statue
artifact_grubstatue.desc: A moving tribute to a tiny plant hugger.

artifact_stethoscope.name: Stethoscope
artifact_stethoscope.desc: Listens to Duplicant heartbeats, or gurgly tummies.

artifact_eggrock.name: Egg-Shaped Rock
artifact_eggrock.desc: It's unclear whether this is its naturally occurring shape, or if its appearance as been sculpted.

artifact_hatchfossil.name: Pristine Fossil
artifact_hatchfossil.desc: The preserved bones of an early species of Hatch.

artifact_rocktornado.name: Tornado Rock
artifact_rocktornado.desc: It's unclear how it formed, although I'm glad it did.

artifact_pacupercolator.name: Percolator
artifact_pacupercolator.desc: Don't drink from it! There was a pacu... IN the percolator!

artifact_dnamodel.name: Double Helix Model
artifact_dnamodel.desc: An educational model of genetic information.

artifact_rainboweggrock.name: Egg-Shaped Rock
artifact_rainboweggrock.desc:
It's unclear whether this is its naturally occurring shape, or if its appearance as been sculpted.

This one is rainbow colored.

artifact_plasmalamp.name: Plasma Lamp
artifact_plasmalamp.desc: No space colony is complete without one.

artifact_solarsystem.name: Self-Contained System
artifact_solarsystem.desc: A marvel of the cosmos, inside this display is an entirely self-contained solar system.

artifact_moonmoonmoon.name: Moonmoonmoon
artifact_moonmoonmoon.desc: A moon's moon's moon. It's very small.

IntermediateRadPill.name: Intermediate Rad Pill
IntermediateRadPill.desc: Increases a Duplicant's natural radiation absorption rate.

IntermediateCure.name: Medical Pack
IntermediateCure.desc: A doctor-administered cure for moderate ailments.

IntermediateBooster.name: Immuno Booster
IntermediateBooster.desc: Significantly reduces the chance of becoming sick.

BasicRadPill.name: Basic Rad Pill
BasicRadPill.desc: Increases a Duplicant's natural radiation absorption rate.

BasicCure.name: Curative Tablet
BasicCure.desc: A simple, easy-to-take remedy for minor germ-based diseases.

BasicBooster.name: Vitamin Chews
BasicBooster.desc: Minorly reduces the chance of becoming sick.

AdvancedCure.name: Serum Vial
AdvancedCure.desc: A doctor-administered cure for severe ailments.

WoodLog.name: Lumber
WoodLog.desc: Wood harvested from an Arbor Tree or an Oakshell.

CompostWormBasicFruit.name: Spindly Grubfruit
CompostWormBasicFruit.desc:
A Grubfruit that failed to develop properly.

It is nonetheless edible, and vaguely tasty.

WormBasicFruit.name: Spindly Grubfruit
WormBasicFruit.desc:
A Grubfruit that failed to develop properly.

It is nonetheless edible, and vaguely tasty.

CompostWormBasicFood.name: Roast Grubfruit Nut
CompostWormBasicFood.desc:
Slow roasted Spindly Grubfruit.

It has a smoky aroma and tastes of coziness.

WormBasicFood.name: Roast Grubfruit Nut
WormBasicFood.desc:
Slow roasted Spindly Grubfruit.

It has a smoky aroma and tastes of coziness.

CompostTofu.name: Tofu
CompostTofu.desc:
A bland curd made from Nosh Beans.

It has an unusual but pleasant consistency.

Tofu.name: Tofu
Tofu.desc:
A bland curd made from Nosh Beans.

It has an unusual but pleasant consistency.

TableSalt.name: Table Salt
TableSalt.desc:
A seasoning that Duplicants can add to their Food to boost Morale.

Duplicants will automatically use Table Salt while sitting at a Mess Table during mealtime.

Only the finest grains are chosen.

CompostSwampLilyFlower.name: Balm Lily Flower
CompostSwampLilyFlower.desc:
A medicinal flower that soothes most minor maladies.

It is exceptionally fragrant.

SwampLilyFlower.name: Balm Lily Flower
SwampLilyFlower.desc:
A medicinal flower that soothes most minor maladies.

It is exceptionally fragrant.

CompostSwampFruit.name: Bog Jelly
CompostSwampFruit.desc: A fruit with an outer film that contains chewy gelatinous cubes.

SwampFruit.name: Bog Jelly
SwampFruit.desc: A fruit with an outer film that contains chewy gelatinous cubes.

CompostSwampDelights.name: Swampy Delights
CompostSwampDelights.desc:
Dried gelatinous cubes from a Bog Jelly.

Each cube has a wonderfully chewy texture and is lightly coated in a delicate powder.

SwampDelights.name: Swampy Delights
SwampDelights.desc:
Dried gelatinous cubes from a Bog Jelly.

Each cube has a wonderfully chewy texture and is lightly coated in a delicate powder.

CompostWormSuperFood.name: Grubfruit Preserve
CompostWormSuperFood.desc:
A long lasting Grubfruit jam preserved in Sucrose.

The thick, goopy jam retains the shape of the jar when poured out, but the sweet taste can't be matched.

WormSuperFood.name: Grubfruit Preserve
WormSuperFood.desc:
A long lasting Grubfruit jam preserved in Sucrose.

The thick, goopy jam retains the shape of the jar when poured out, but the sweet taste can't be matched.

DehydratedSurfAndTurf.name: Dried Surf'n'Turf
DehydratedSurfAndTurf.desc:
A dehydrated Surf'n'Turf ration. It must be rehydrated in order to be considered Food.

Dry rations have no expiry date.

DehydratedSpicyTofu.name: Dried Spicy Tofu
DehydratedSpicyTofu.desc:
A dehydrated Spicy Tofu ration. It must be rehydrated in order to be considered Food.

Dry rations have no expiry date.

CompostSpicyTofu.name: Spicy Tofu
CompostSpicyTofu.desc:
Tofu marinated in a flavorful Pincha Peppernut sauce.

It packs a delightful punch.

SpicyTofu.name: Spicy Tofu
SpicyTofu.desc:
Tofu marinated in a flavorful Pincha Peppernut sauce.

It packs a delightful punch.

CompostSpiceNut.name: Pincha Peppernut
CompostSpiceNut.desc:
The flavorful nut of a Pincha Pepperplant.

The bitter outer rind hides a rich, peppery core that is useful in cooking.

SpiceNut.name: Pincha Peppernut
SpiceNut.desc:
The flavorful nut of a Pincha Pepperplant.

The bitter outer rind hides a rich, peppery core that is useful in cooking.

DehydratedSpiceBread.name: Dried Pepper Bread
DehydratedSpiceBread.desc:
A dehydrated Pepper Bread ration. It must be rehydrated in order to be considered Food.

Dry rations have no expiry date.

CompostSpiceBread.name: Pepper Bread
CompostSpiceBread.desc:
A loaf of bread, lightly spiced with Pincha Peppernut for a mild bite.

There's a simple joy to be had in pulling it apart in one's fingers.

SpiceBread.name: Pepper Bread
SpiceBread.desc:
A loaf of bread, lightly spiced with Pincha Peppernut for a mild bite.

There's a simple joy to be had in pulling it apart in one's fingers.

CompostShellfishMeat.name: Raw Shellfish
CompostShellfishMeat.desc: An uncooked chunk of very dead Sanishell. Yum!

ShellfishMeat.name: Raw Shellfish
ShellfishMeat.desc: An uncooked chunk of very dead Sanishell. Yum!

DehydratedSalsa.name: Dried Stuffed Berry
DehydratedSalsa.desc:
A dehydrated Stuffed Berry ration. It must be rehydrated in order to be considered Food.

Dry rations have no expiry date.

CompostSurfAndTurf.name: Surf'n'Turf
CompostSurfAndTurf.desc:
A bit of Meat from the land and Cooked Seafood from the sea.

It's hearty and satisfying.

SurfAndTurf.name: Surf'n'Turf
SurfAndTurf.desc:
A bit of Meat from the land and Cooked Seafood from the sea.

It's hearty and satisfying.

CompostWormSuperFruit.name: Grubfruit
CompostWormSuperFruit.desc: A plump, healthy fruit with a honey-like taste.

WormSuperFruit.name: Grubfruit
WormSuperFruit.desc: A plump, healthy fruit with a honey-like taste.

FossilBitsLarge.name: Fossil Fragments
FossilBitsLarge.desc: Bony debris that can be excavated for Fossil.

ResearchDatabank.name: Data Bank
ResearchDatabank.desc: Raw data that can be processed into Interstellar Research points.

PowerStationTools.name: Microchip
PowerStationTools.desc:
A specialized Microchip created by a professional engineer.

Tunes up Generators to increase their Power output.

OrbitalResearchDatabank.name: Data Bank
OrbitalResearchDatabank.desc: Raw Data that can be processed into Data Analysis Research points.

MachineParts.name: Custom Parts
MachineParts.desc:
Specialized Parts crafted by a professional engineer.

Jerry Rig machine buildings to increase their efficiency.

FarmStationTools.name: Micronutrient Fertilizer
FarmStationTools.desc:
Specialized Fertilizer mixed by a Duplicant with the Crop Tending Skill.

Increases the Growth Rate of one Plant.

CompostEggShell.name: Egg Shell
CompostEggShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

EggShell.name: Egg Shell
EggShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

DreamJournal.name: Dream Journal
DreamJournal.desc:
A hand-scrawled account of Pajama-induced dreams.

Can be analyzed using a Somnium Synthesizer.

FoodSplat.name: Food Splatter
FoodSplat.desc: Food smeared on the wall from a recent Food Fight

CompostCrabWoodShell.name: Oakshell Molt
CompostCrabWoodShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lumber.

CrabWoodShell.name: Oakshell Molt
CrabWoodShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lumber.

CompostBabyCrabWoodShell.name: Small Oakshell Molt
CompostBabyCrabWoodShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lumber.

BabyCrabWoodShell.name: Small Oakshell Molt
BabyCrabWoodShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lumber.

CompostBabyCrabShell.name: Small Pokeshell Molt
CompostBabyCrabShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

BabyCrabShell.name: Small Pokeshell Molt
BabyCrabShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

GeneShuffler.name: Neural Vacillator
GeneShuffler.desc:
A massive synthetic brain, suspended in saline solution.

There is a chair attached to the device with room for one person.

FossilRock.name: Petrified Fossil
FossilRock.desc:
The well-preserved partial remains of a critter of unknown origin.

It appears to belong to the same ancient specimen found at another site.

This fragment has been preserved in petrified Dirt.

FossilResin.name: Amber Fossil
FossilResin.desc:
The well-preserved partial remains of a critter of unknown origin.

It appears to belong to the same ancient specimen found at another site.

This fragment has been preserved in a resin-like substance.

FossilIce.name: Frozen Fossil
FossilIce.desc:
The well-preserved partial remains of a critter of unknown origin.

It appears to belong to the same ancient specimen found at another site.

This fragment has been preserved in Ice.

FossilBitsSmall.name: Fossil Fragments
FossilBitsSmall.desc: Bony debris that can be excavated for Fossil.

CompostCrabShell.name: Pokeshell Molt
CompostCrabShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

CrabShell.name: Pokeshell Molt
CrabShell.desc: Can be crushed to produce Lime.

GasGrassHarvested.name: Gas Grass
GasGrassHarvested.desc: Gas Grass is an alien lifeform tentatively categorized as a "plant," which makes up the entirety of the Gassy Moo's diet.

PropGravitasLabTable.name: Lab Desk
PropGravitasLabTable.desc:
The quaint research desk of a departed lab technician.

Perhaps the computer stores something of interest.

PropGravitasJar2.name: Sample Jar
PropGravitasJar2.desc: The corpse of a proto-hatch creature meticulously preserved in a jar.

PropGravitasJar1.name: Big Brain Jar
PropGravitasJar1.desc: An abnormally large brain floating in embalming liquid to prevent decomposition.

PropGravitasHandScanner.name: Hand Scanner
PropGravitasHandScanner.desc:
A sophisticated security device.

It appears to use a method other than fingerprints to verify an individual's identity.

PropGravitasFloorRobot.name: Robotic Arm
PropGravitasFloorRobot.desc: The grasping robotic claw designed to assist technicians in a lab.

PropGravitasFirstAidKit.name: First Aid Kit
PropGravitasFirstAidKit.desc: It looks like it's been used a lot.

PropGravitasDisplay4.name: Electronic Display
PropGravitasDisplay4.desc:
An electronic display projecting the blueprint of a robotic device.

It looks like a ceiling robot.

PropGravitasRobitcTable.name: Robotics Research Desk
PropGravitasRobitcTable.desc: The work space of an extinct robotics technician who left behind some unfinished prototypes.

PropGravitasDeskPodium.name: Computer Podium
